title: 84/655/EEC: Council Decision of 10 December 1984 concerning the extension of the machinery for medium-term financial assistance
header:
COUNCIL  DECISION
of 10 December 1984
concerning the extension of the machinery for medium-term financial assistance
(84/655/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1 (2) of Decision 71/143/EEC is hereby replaced by the following:
'2. This obligation shall apply until 31 December 1986, unless the definitive phase of the EMS is set up before this date.'
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 December 1984.
For the Council
The President
A. DUKES
